QuestData.Title: Tabards of the Illidari
QuestData.Description: The wind riders must return to Shadowmoon Village to prepare for the next phase of our assault. What I need from you now are the tabards that these blood elves wear.$B$BWhen you have collected enough tabards, call for a wind rider using the Kor'kron flare gun. Prepare yourself for a bit of espionage, $r!
QuestData.CompletionText: What have you to report, soldier?
QuestData.RewardText: Ah-ha! These will do quite nicely.
